home.melhores.produtos.descricao: Acetic silicone sealant with fungicide for professional use, suitable for sealing smooth and non-ferrous surfaces - glass, aluminum, tiles, bathroom fixtures, vitrified ceramics, fibers, acrylics, some types of plastics, among others Packaging: Cartridge 280gr.
home.banner.descricao: Our essence is a solid partnership with our customers and suppliers
home.beneficios.formapagamento.descricao: We offer flexible payment options, to make it easier for you.
home.beneficios.politica.descricao: You can return a product within 7 days
home.beneficios.suporte.descricao: Our customer support from monday to friday
home.newsletter.descricao: Subscribe our newsletter and receive promotions
home.newsletter.aviso: We will never spam you. Only useful information
empresa.secao1.titulo: Thinking of better solutions for the construction industry?
empresa.secao1.descricao: UNIPRO Selantes was founded with the aim of not only presenting, but also making these solutions available in the best possible way, quickly, practically and safely.
empresa.secao2.subtitulo: Working in the distribution and representation of sealants and fasteners for more than a decade.
empresa.secao2.descricao: UNIPRO has been solidifying more and more and increasing its area of ​​activity, also bringing other materials from the Civil Construction sector.
empresa.secao2.produto1.descricao: Sealant for professional use, adheres to different surfaces, water resistant, etc.
empresa.secao2.produto2.descricao: Drilling bits of various sizes, fixing metallic structures, wood, aluminum, etc.
empresa.secao2.produto3.descricao: Several other products aimed at the civil and industrial construction sector.
empresa.secao3.descricao: Now, also operating in INDUSTRIAL sector, we manufacture our own line of sealants,fasteners and silicones,,bringing more and more quality, value and safety to our customers and partners.
empresa.secao4.descricao: Get to know UNIPRO, the most complete industry in the interior of São Paulo, with a total commitment to the customer!
empresa.localizacao.descricao: Located in Marília, in the interior of the state of São Paulo, we deliver throughout Brazil, and we are committed not only to creating, but also to maintaining a solid and lasting partnership with our partners and customers, with the best sales and delivery conditions in the market.
